document.full_text: bruised by a lengthy battle over royalties in argentina, u.s. seed giant monsanto is asking the nation's farmers to sign contracts promising to pay to use the company's new seed technology.
document.title: monsanto signs royalty deals with argentine farmers
lines_and_colors: bruised by a lengthy battle over royalties in argentina, u.s. seed giant monsanto is asking the nation's farmers to sign contracts promising to pay to use the company's new seed technology.
